name: gb-sounds
effect: Used by trainer outside of battle : Changes the background music to the equivalent 8-bit music.
short_effect: Use to listen to GameBoy era audio.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A music player that allows you to listen to nostalgic songs. It’s operated with the flip of a single switch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A music player that allows you to listen to nostalgic songs. It’s operated with the flip of a single switch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A music player that allows you to listen to nostalgic songs. It’s operated with the flip of a single switch.
